description: Creates a domain, which is a container for all case data, such as cases, fields, templates and layouts. Each Amazon Connect instance can be associated with only one Cases domain.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name for your Cases domain. It must be unique for your Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: domainArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the Cases domain.

nested_items.name: domainId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the Cases domain.
